summary: Email correspondence from September 27, 2021, attaching text files and Eclipse note files related to a December 4, 2009 deposition in the Epstein case. The sender appears to be a real estate professional offering documents from their records.

persons.name: Robb
persons.context: Sender of the email providing deposition documents from December 4, 2009; appears to be associated with Robb Realty Atlanta.

events.title: December 4, 2009 deposition
events.description: A deposition that took place on December 4, 2009, related to the Epstein case; text files and original notes from this deposition are being shared in the email.

keyFacts: The email attaches documents related to a December 4, 2009 deposition in the Epstein case.
The sender provides both text files and original Eclipse note files from the deposition.
The correspondence date is September 27, 2021, indicating ongoing document sharing or review years after the deposition.
The sender appears to be a real estate professional (Robb Realty Atlanta), suggesting possible property-related aspects to the case.
The email subject references 'Text files of Volume 1 and Volume 2', indicating the deposition materials are extensive and multi-volume.
